data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Shuxia, Jia, Yanyan (2017): Review of the genus Promalactis (Lepidoptera: Oecophoridae) Meyrick, 1908 (II). The suzukiella group, with descriptions of eight new species. Zootaxa 4363 (3): 361-376, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4363.3.3|47 occurrences
